## mbt build pr

Builds a pr from src branch to dst branch

### Synopsis


Builds a pr from src branch to dst branch

```
mbt build pr --src <branch> --dst <branch> [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --dst string   destination branch
  -h, --help         help for pr
      --src string   source branch
```
